summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new RentMaestro features: APScheduler automated reminders, document management system, and interactive calendar. All backend APIs functional, frontend UI working correctly with minor timing issues in automated tests.

design_issues.issue: Minor timing issues with dropdown selection in automated tests, but UI is functional

passed_tests: Backend API health check (28/28 tests passed - 100% success rate)
Calendar page navigation and day selection
Calendar stats display and event visualization
Documents page with upload form functionality
Sidebar navigation includes Calendar and Documents links
All CRUD operations for properties, tenants, leases, payments
